Issue.summary: send CLAIM_DEF Claim DEF was published when it should not have been
Issue.description: exception=AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'issuerId'",)> Expected Results: User-friendly error message about incorrect REF parameter. Task exception was never retrieved future: <Task finished coro= exception=AttributeError("'tuple' object has no attribute 'seqId'",)> Expected Results: There should be no error or exception messages because the claim definition is successfully published. >
